snippet.title: Slaves of Magic ( PC Indie Game ) story introduction trailer
snippet.description:
Slaves of Magic is a fantasy turn-based tactical RPG, heavily inspired by the XCOM series. The invaders have the knowledge of how to use elemental magic, and with it, they try to enslave your world. Your job will be to lead the resistance against these invading forces!

Combat demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1424010/Slaves_of_Magic_prelude/

Learn more on our website: https://www.indiedb.com/games/slaves-of-magic

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SlavesOfMagic

All press related info and materials: https://www.indiedb.com/games/slaves-of-magic/presskit
